synopsis.text: Kouta and Yuka's peaceful lives are forever altered when they stumble upon a seemingly innocent, injured girl on the beach, whom they name Nyuu. Unbeknownst to them, Nyuu is a member of the Diclonius, a new breed of humans feared for their telekinetic abilities and distinct horns. Escaping from a government facility that held her captive, Nyuu's violent past resurfaces as she struggles with her lost memories and a dangerous split personality. As Kouta and Yuka welcome her into their home, they inadvertently entangle themselves in a world of secrets, conspiracy, and the constant threat of the powerful being they've taken in.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
